text: Kananjalo banqula nto zimbi ngaphandle koAllâh ezingenakubenza bubi, zingekhe zibazuzise nto, baze bathi: “Ezi (zithixo, okanye, ezi zinyanya) zethu ngabathetheleli bethu kuAllâh.” Yithi (kubo): “Ingaba nixelela uAllâh ngezinto Angenalwazi ngazo emazulwini nasemhlabeni kusini na? Makazukiswe, Yena Uphakamile, Ungentla kwazo zonke (ezo zinto) bazayamanisa naYe.”
